short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Accompanied expectant parents on their journey toward the big day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Baby Countdown, the heartwarming Chrome extension that is designed to create a delightful and personalized experience for users eagerly awaiting the arrival of their baby.
The Baby Countdown extension changes your search engine in the new tab to Microsoft Bing and provides the features: Personalized Countdown, Daily Countdown Updates, Charming Baby Backgrounds and Convenient web search.
By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the Baby Countdown Chrome extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Service- https://simplisync-solutions.com/terms-of-service and Privacy Policy https://www.simplisync-solutions.com/privacy-policy.

About us:
At â€¦.we believe in the power of celebrating the special moments in life. Our dedicated team of developers and designers has crafted this Chrome extension with one simple goal: Celebrate Every Moment- Pregnancy is a special journey, and Baby Countdown is designed to celebrate each day, turning the waiting period into a delightful experience.
With charming baby backgrounds, daily countdown updates, and a commitment to user privacy.

Join us in turning your browsing sessions into a heartwarming journey toward the much-anticipated due date, surrounded by the joy of cute baby visuals! Celebrate the countdown with each click, and let the excitement build as you await the arrival of your precious little one.
